content:
I’m getting the following error when my IDP returns a response. What accounts for “failed signature validation”?
2021-09-02 16:47:53.443 INFO [zulip.auth.saml] AuthFailed: Authentication failed: SAML login failed: ['invalid_response'] (Signature validation failed. SAML Response rejected)
Hmm, do you have the correct IdP certificate correctly saved in /etc/zulip/saml/idps/? @David Bain

Mateusz Mandera said:

Hmm, do you have the correct IdP certificate correctly saved in /etc/zulip/saml/idps/? David Bain

I didn’t, it workds now..
Tim Abbott has marked this topic as resolved.
